dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: Hello there, stranger. I'm Simon, I run the market place here in town.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: It's nice to meet you too. Its strange seeing somebody come into town during these times.

options.text: These times? What do you mean.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: Oh. Umm. I see. I wish you well.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: Well it depends on who you're asking, some people believe while others do not. I don't know exactly what's going on, but there have been strange noises at night, missing villagers, and rumors of dark magic. I've tried to keep the market open and provide for my son, but it's getting harder every day.

options.text: I heard from him a week ago

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: Oh... Uh. I am sorry to be the one telling you this but no body has heard from Arthur in nearly a month.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: a.. again sorry about you uncle.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: oh uhh, hey there how can I help you?

options.text: What did you mean by 'these times'.

dialogues.speaker: Simon
dialogues.text: I dont know much more. Maybe Speak with Jameson
